alert.note: Alert for Granite, Green, Ferris, Rattlesnake Mountains; Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 21 at 1:15AM MDT until August 21 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY...Fire Weather Zones 283 and 289. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Fremont...Natrona. In Southwest WY...Sweetwater. * IMPACTS: Low Humidities and strong gusty winds will create erratic fire behavior and new fire starts. * WIND: Southwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 15 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs in the 90s.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Granite, Green, Ferris, Rattlesnake Mountains; Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin
